completion.item:
Adds a selection listener on the tree
Parameters: (gara.jswt.SelectionListener) listener - the desired listener to be added to this tree
Throws: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener

Deselects a specific item
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TreeItem) item - the item to deselect
Deselect all items in the tree

Returns a specifiy item with a zero-related index
Parameters: (int) index - the zero-related index
Throws: gara.OutOfBoundsException - if the index does not live within this tree
Returns: the item

Returns the amount of the items in the tree
Returns: the amount

Returns an array with all the items in the tree
Returns: an array with the items

Returns whether the lines of the tree are visible or not
Returns: true if the lines are visible and false if they are not

Returns an array with the items which are currently selected in the tree
Returns: an array with items

Returns the amount of the selected items in the tree
Returns: the amount

Looks for the index of a specified item
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TreeItem) item - the item for the index
Throws: gara.jswt.ItemNotExistsException - if the item does not exist in this tree TypeError - if the item is not a TreeItem
Returns: the index of the specified item

Removes a selection listener from this tree
Parameters: (gara.jswt.SelectionListener) listener - the listener to be removed from this tree
Throws: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener
Select all items in the list

Sets lines visible or invisible.
Parameters: (boolean) show - true if the lines should be visible or false for invisibility
